<a id="MenuButton"></a>

# MenuButton

**Inherits:** [Button](Button.md) **\<** [BaseButton](BaseButton.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A button that brings up a [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) when clicked.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A button that brings up a [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) when clicked. To create new items inside this [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md), use ``get_popup().add_item("My Item Name")``. You can also create them directly from Redot editor's inspector.

See also [BaseButton](BaseButton.md) which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

<!-- classref-signal -->

**about_to_popup**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MenuButton_signal_about_to_popup)

Emitted when the [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) of this MenuButton is about to show.

## Property Descriptions

<a id="MenuButton_property_item_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **item_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#MenuButton_property_item_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_item_count**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_item_count**\ (\ )

The number of items currently in the list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuButton_property_switch_on_hover"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **switch_on_hover** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#MenuButton_property_switch_on_hover)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_switch_on_hover**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_switch_on_hover**\ (\ )

If ``true``, when the cursor hovers above another **MenuButton** within the same parent which also has [switch_on_hover](MenuButton.md#MenuButton_property_switch_on_hover) enabled, it will close the current **MenuButton** and open the other one.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="MenuButton_method_get_popup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) **get_popup**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MenuButton_method_get_popup)

Returns the [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) contained in this button.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [Window.visible](Window.md#Window_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuButton_method_set_disable_shortcuts"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_disable_shortcuts**\ (\ disabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MenuButton_method_set_disable_shortcuts)

If ``true``, shortcuts are disabled and cannot be used to trigger the button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuButton_method_show_popup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **show_popup**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MenuButton_method_show_popup)

Adjusts popup position and sizing for the **MenuButton**, then shows the [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md). Prefer this over using ``get_popup().popup()``.
